name: Tactical Vengeance: Play The Games
storyline:
Welcome to the Match. Go in and win like a champion with your team, or solo in PVP. Fight your way to become the player of the match and earn more Points than your opponent's team. Shoot your enemies and control the Match together with your team.

Play 6 different Match with your friends or/and alone with Bots. Be creative and tactical to master what is needed. You can play Singleplayer and Multiplayer or PvP. Own Medals, Achievements, Playerlevel and PlayerRank through the Matchs. Be the best of the Match is not always easy because you will die from lack of water or food. Make your own LAN Party and play together or play with new people in the hole world!

Play 6 Match Conquest, Kill Comfirmed, Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Player VS Player, Rush.
Co-op multiplayer Play with your friends, or get new playmates. Play together and win the Match to be the best team.
9 starter weapons You can play with Rifles, Machinegun, pistols, shotgun, Sniper and Knife. More weapons will come.
6 different starter Maps Play Match games in 6 differents starter Maps, which is from different locations around the the world and Fantasy.

Own Medals, Achievements and Playerlevel Through playing can you own Medals as collecting to your Playerprofile. Collect Achievements that you own through each Match. The more actively you play and helping your team, the higher your Level will be.
Food and Water You have to find food and water, so as not to die from lack of food and water.
summary: Play 6 different Match with your friends or/and alone with Bots. Be creative and tactical to master what is needed. You can play Singleplayer and Multiplayer or PvP. Own Medals, Achievements, Playerlevel and PlayerRank through the Matchs. Be the best of the Match is not always easy because you will die from lack of water or food. Make your own LAN Party and play together or play with new people.
